definitions: A large, thin, flat case for loose sheets of paper such as drawings or maps.
A collection of financial assets such as stocks, bonds, or other investments held by an individual or institution.
A range of products or services offered by a company or organization.
A set of pieces of creative work, such as drawings, paintings, or photographs, intended to demonstrate an artist's skill or style.
examples: She brought her portfolio to the job interview.
He manages a diverse portfolio of assets.
The company expanded its portfolio of services.
